name: Lockout
description:
Looking for an app to help keep your memory sharp? Lockout is the game for you!

Lockout takes a simple pattern locking mechanism and turns it into a nifty tool for memorization.

Patterns are randomly generated, then displayed with animations and sounds in real time for you to memorize and recreate.

The more patterns you can remember, the better your score.

Features:

Super simple game play!

Workout your brain in a fun way!

Use Google Play Services to compare your score to friends/enemies!

Game is priced at zilch!

Random Facts:

Lockout was built using Unity3d.

Lockout was made in one week with love. #onegameaweek
